item.title: Sniffing Wi-Fi with Aircrack-ng. Attacking Wi-fi Using Deauthentication.
item.description: Warning:- This blog is Created for the educational use only to show wireless penetration testing.Using this information for malicious activity can send you behind the jails.Use your own router for the Demonstration What do we learn in this tutorial:- Modes of USB Wi-Fi Adapter How to hide your identity before penetrating Wi-Fi Able to see Wi-fi networks Able to see Connected Clients with corresponding Wi-Fi network Deauthentication attack Requirements:- VMware(Installtion of VMware) Kali Linux (Installtion of Kali in VMware) USB Wi-Fi adapter which has Monitor mode 1) Modes of USB Wi-Fi adaptor USB Wi-Fi has 2 Modes: 1) Managed mode 2) Monitor mode Generally, All USB Wi-Fi adapter comes with managed mode by default.
